headline: Why PPL Corporation (PPL) Went Up On Friday?
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Firms End Friday Strong; 3 Reach All-Time Highs. In this article, we are going to take a look at where PPL Corporation (NYSE:PPL) stands against other firms that end Friday strong. Wall Street’s main indices finished the trading week in the negative territory as investor sentiment was weighed […]
